mapper.update: insert ignore into success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone, state) values (#{seckill},#{userPhone},1)
mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id=#{seckilledId} and sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
